title: Naboth’s Vineyard
summary: King Ahab covets Naboth’s vineyard, but Naboth refuses to sell it. Queen Jezebel arranges for Naboth to be falsely accused and executed. Ahab takes the land, but Elijah confronts him with judgment from God. Ahab humbles himself, so God delays the full punishment until after his death.

faq.question: Why was God angry with Ahab?
faq.answer: Because he took Naboth’s vineyard through injustice and murder orchestrated by Jezebel.

faq.question: What happened when Ahab humbled himself?
faq.answer: God delayed the disaster until after Ahab’s death.
